org.elasticsearch.action

Interface DocumentRequest<T>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IndicesRequest
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DeleteRequest, IndexRequest, TermVectorsRequest, UpdateRequest

    public interface DocumentRequest<T>
extends IndicesRequest
    Generic interface to group ActionRequest, which work on single document level Forces this class return index/type/id getters

    • Nested Class Summary
